texts.pageText:
06.February.2011
Chinese New Year (Year of the Rabbit)
As each year passes and as the animals jump according the lunar calendar, one thing still stays; Ang Pows! However apart from the receiving our annual bonuses, we should also embrace traditional and bring in the good fortune by cleaning up our houses! Just my 2cents aye. Gong Xi Fa Cai!


16.January.2011
Visiting of my adopted Animal
Today bring me to the Singapore Zoo, a placed that bring back fone memories of childhood. Managed to snap a couple of good photo's to be submitted for my photojournalism assignment as well as to catch a glimpse of my adopted animal at the Zoo. It always had a love for animals since i was a child, slowly moving a tiny Terrapin Turtles to Cats and now to my Golden Retriever; Chloe. And lastly, as i was driving out, i managed to see a poster on a Zoo 8km Run that tempted me to sign up! Guess what... Looking forward! 12th February here i come!



01.January.2011
Happy New Year from Malaysia truly Asia
Yup, quite a hasty decision, but a good one i reckon. Just 2 days back i was thinking, what should i do this year. Apart from the conventional countdown at sentosa or watching fireworks by the Singapore River, it got me thinking, 1-1-11. Lets make it happen! Thus well, a click of the hotels and wham! i'm in Genting Highlands enjoying the breeze. Wilson Signing out!

Singapore Zoo Race . Marina Bay Sands . Butterfactory
Day Events: - Interview (Ambassadors) - Singapore Zoo 8km Race - Marina Bay Sands (Networking) - Butter-factory (Night Life)

- Maris Stella Primary [PSLE Certificate]

- Monfort Secondary

- Saint Gabriel's Secondary [GCE N' Levels] [GCE O' Levels]

- Anglo Chinese Junior College [GCE A' Levels]

- Nanyang Academy of Fine Arts [Access Course Certificate]

- Ngee Ann Polytechnic [Diploma in Business Studies] Marketing & Psychology Specialization

Young Master Lai
Many of you might think? Why is the caption "Game Commences". Personally I always feel that life is a game and we are the players, our fate lies in how we maneuver ourselves around and how we are able to navigate to the finish line. The quote that has gotten stuck in my head all these years is "We do what we have to do, so that we can do what we want to do. Food for thought...


The Dirty-Bit :P
Since my younger years, i've always been a very mischievous little prankster, always causing misery & joy to the people around me. Rules! (Never knew how to spell it and never abided by it ever) Until one day, I experienced an Epiphany. I was lacking behind my peers by quite a distance in terms of accomplishments, academics and maturity.



Realization
I started concentrating on what was important. Leaving my past behind, putting all the things I used to love behind me and moving forward. I was a difficult ordeal, however it was something that was necessary for me, something i had to do for myself. As the chinese saying goes "xian ku hou tian".


Inspiration
I always believe inspiration comes from within, we can always have various teachers, educators, lecturers constantly imparting knowledge to us, however the greatest teacher that can teach us is always ourselves; (Self-learning). The quote displayed on the left; depicts my life. I believe that everything that i have achieved till now is based on handwork, determination and diligence. This does not make me any different than anyone else, everyone is special is their own way and it is how people take the effort to capitalize on their advantages and use their strengths in a way that they can best reap the seeds that they sow.

LEADERSHIP POSITIONS
- Drum Major (Discipline) - Band Major (Music) - Section Leader (Principle Player) - Floorball (Captain) - Student Leaders Council - Level Head (Secondary 5) - Head of Welfare & Alumni Relations Officer (Ngee Ann Ambassadors) - Alter Servers (Vice-President / Secretary)

READ MORE

National Representation (Singapore)
-Singapore National Youth Orchestra -Singapore Floorball League (Division 2)

School Representation (Ngee Ann Polytechnic) - Singapore Institute of Management Challenge - University of Adelaide (Entrepreneurship Competition) - Singapore Management University (Lee Kuan Yew Global Business Plan Challenge) - National University of Singapore (Start-up @ Singapore Challenge) - Nanyang Technological University (Ideas.Inc. Business Challenge)

Awards
-Academic Achievement Award (3years): Secondary 3 / 4 / 5 - Eagles Awards (CCA Achievements) - Colours Awards (Uniform Groups) - Singapore Youth Festival (Music) (Singapore) : Gold with Honors (2007) : Silver (2005) : Silver (2003) - Jungfrau Music Festival (Music) (Switzerland) : Gold with Top Honors (First Position) - Crime Scene Investigation (Singapore) : 1st Runner Up - University of Adelaide (E-Challenge) : Top 6 Finalist - Floorball : B Division - National 3rd (Singapore) : A Division - National 5th (Singapore)

link.item: Community Service - Overseas Youth Expedition Program (Vietnam) Hosting Experience - School of Business & Accountancy (Orientation Conventions) Emcee Events Organizer - Polytechnic Experience (Committee Head) - Red Camp 7 (Head of Marketing & Publicity Committee) - Open House (Committee Head) - Youth Leaders Camp (Student Facilitator)

texts.pageText: <font color="#252525">.</font> -Run a full Marathon (42.142km) -Go to Officer Cadet School -Complete a Pilgrimage -Backpack to South Africa (Cape Town)(Johannesburg) -Abseiling @ Tasmania

- Establish a listed company

- Make the cover of "Forbe" Magazine

Camera's Inventory : Nikon D90 : Olympus SP590 : Canon 300HS / 700
PHOTOGRAPHY My passion for photography only surfaced when i started to travel the world. "In life is not the number of breaths you take, but the number of moments that take your breath away" How nice i wondered if i could document these moments :)

ART & DESIGN
Art is very personal towards me, it being my first award that was won a tender age of 7, Art & Design offers an avenue for me to express my creativity and let it run wild.

Lastly MUSIC What can i say, it was the fluid that drives the soul. It all started when i was 5 years old, my very first instrument; Electone, before progressing to an Piano & then finally embarking on my Brass journey. (Trumpet to Bartone to Euphonium to Bass and finally Tuba) Music is an integral part of my life, an avenue for me to express "feelings", it has accompanied me in every point of my life.

221 Queensway,
Singapore, Viz @ Holland.
MOBILE: +65 9022 0155
TELEPHONE: +65 6405 9406
OFFICE: +65 6323 1833
wilsoncyruslai@gmail.com
Thank You for visiting my Website For any personal enquires; Please leave your details behind and i'll get back to you shortly. Thats all for now, take care!

section.name: privacyPolicy
section.item:
PRAESENT VESTIBULUM MOLESTIE LACUS. AENEAN NONUMMY HENDRERIURIS. PHASELLUS PORTA. FUSCE SUSCIPIT VARIUS MI. CUM SOCIIS NATOQUE PENA-TIBUS ET MAGNIS DIS PARTURIENT MONTES, NASCETUR RIDICULUS MUSLLA DUI. FUSCE FEUGIAT MALESUADA ODIO. MORBI NUNC ODIO, GRAVIDA AT.

CURSUS NEC, LUCTUS A, LOREM. MAECENAS TRISTIQUE ORCI AC SEM. DUISE ULTRICIES PHARETRA MAGNA. DONEC ACCUMSAN MALESUADA ORCI. DONECT SIT AMET EROS. LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET, CONSECTETUER ADIPISCING ELIT. MAURIS FERMENTUM DICTUM MAGNA. SED LAOREET ALIQUAM LEOUTER TELLUS DOLOR, DAPIBUS EGET, ELEMENTUM VEL, CURSUS ELEIFEND, ELIT.

AENEAN AUCTOR WISI ET URNA. ALIQUAM ERAT VOLUTPAT. DUIS AC TURPISE INTEGER RUTRUM ANTE EU LACUSQUISQUE NULLA. VESTIBULUM LIBERO NISL, PORTA VEL, SCELERISQUE EGET, MALESUADA AT, NEQUE. VIVAMUS EGETIBH. ETIAM CURSUS LEO VEL METUS. NULLA FACILISI. AENEAN NEROSESTIBULUM ANTE IPSUM PRIMIS IN FAUCIBUS ORCI LUCTUS ET ULTRICES POSUERE.

CUBILIA CURAE; SUSPENDISSE SOLLICITUDIN VELIT SED LEO. UT PHARETRAW AUGUE NEC AUGUE. NAM ELIT MAGNA, HENDRERIT SIT AMET, TINCIDUNT ACO VIVERRA SED, NULLA. DONEC PORTA DIAM EU MASSA. QUISQUE DIAM LOREM, INTERDUM VITAE, DAPIBUS AC, SCELERISQUE VITAE, PEDE. DONEC EGETTEL

VESTIBULUM IACULIS LACINIA EST. PROIN DICTUM ELEMENTUM VELIT. FUSCE EUISMOD CONSEQUAT ANTE. LOREM IPSUM DOLOR SIT AMET, CONSECTETUER ADIPISCING ELIT.PELLENTESQUE SED DOLOR. ALIQUAM CONGUE FERMENTUM

SCING ALIQUET. NULLA VENENATIS. IN PEDE MI, ALIQUET SIT AMET, EUISMOD IN, AUCTOR UT, LIGULA. ALIQUAM DAPIBUS TINCIDUNT METUS. PRAESENTSTO DOLOR, LOBORTIS QUIS, LOBORTIS DIGNISSIM, PULVINAR AC, LOREMLUS NON ERAT LACINIA FERMENTUM. DONEC IN VELIT VEL IPSUM AUCTOR.

E-MAIL: INFO@COMPANYNAME.COM
